oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Words and Music Night - 2013-04-30
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Words and Music night program held in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 30, 2013. Professional songwriters with student co-writers performing songs they have written together during the course of the school year. Hosted by Gretchen Wilson.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Gretchen Wilson;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: When I Sing (Leanne Rayo with Cheyenne Sweeley); No Thanks (Anne E. DeChant with Phoebe Proctor and Brenna White); Love The Fall (Jason Duke with Laura Knott); I Hate Broccoli (Gary Culley with Joseph Owens); I’m So Sorry, Arianna (Kathy Hussey with Ashley Juarez and Arianna Myers); Walking Down The Hallway (Sandy Ramos with Buchanan Lindsey); Homework Blues (Jeff Dayton with Ben Kane); Bored (Erick Hedrick and Christy McDonald with Daniel Allen); Heroes (Tammy Vice with Mohamed Mahamoud); Cody, Why Did You Have to Go? (Bob Spanburgh with Emily Cherry and Taylor Simmons); Falling In Love (Misty Rae with Marsha Brown and Diamond Corder); Chicken Noodle Soup (Gary Michael Smith with Kayvon Arab); Don’t Worry (Jerry Vandiver with Devyn Paulk); Run For Your Life (Shane Adams with Brooks Johnson and Mason Robb); Bigger Than This Town (Tim Buppert with Krystin King);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Wilson, Gretchen; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
